definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><comment pinned="false" h="52" w="289">This gets the coordinates of the provided entity, then prints the coordinates in the action bar.</comment><value name="text"><block type="text_join" inline="true"><mutation items="6"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">x: </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">y: </field></block></value><value name="ADD3"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="ADD4"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">z: </field></block></value><value name="ADD5"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></next></block></xml>
